title: Unlike BoRK, Kindred's passive on-hit can't lifesteal, isn't capped vs monsters, minimizes at 640 HP
body:
I think this, Aatrox's W, and J4's passive are the only physical damage on-hits that don't proc lifesteal, and I'm fairly certain it is the only %HP in the game not capped vs monsters.

Her on-hit deals 1.25% current HP in physical damage, with a minimum of 8 damage per stack - that means against anyone with less than 640 HP, it deals damage as if they had 640 HP. The minimum damage IS NOT in the tooltip, but is very evident in game.

replies.body:
It is actually capped vs monsters at [75 as confirmed by Meddler](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/THNELApb-after-6-stacks-kindred-wolf-should-hunt-dragonbaron-only?comment=000000000002) , and if the cap isn't working, it's a bug.

They didn't ever say there was a minimum amount or if there is what that amount was hasn't been disclosed, so your guess is as good as any.

Applying/not applying lifesteal is probably a balance decision, because for a jungle champ who is already really good against Baron and Dragon late game, giving her more sustain might be too much.

It hasn't been capped... ever. They said it was supposed to be 75, but it's never actually been capped. I've done ranked recently with a guy who went Kindred and near four shot baron at the 20 minute mark when it spawned.

Well that's an awkward goof on Riot's end, I was wondering why Kindred scaled so hard into late game.

I'm well aware that it was meant to be capped, but it never functioned. Its uncapped, I can promise you.

The minimum damage is interesting. I wasn't expecting it,  but its very clearly there as well. I guess I need to take a video. It's like Mundo's q - it does the higher total of a flat amount, or a % current hp.
{{champion:254}} denting blow damage doesn't proc lifesteal unfortunately.

I dunno, even as a semi-Vi main, I got to say that's probably a good thing. If denting blows dealt percent health, reduced armor, increased attack speed, *and* proc'd lifesteal it would give her way too much synergy with BORK and perhaps devourer. Ganks would be even more deadly. And unlike some champs, her W passive scales with AD.
Makes sense. Otherwise lifesteal would be insane on her- she'd be healing for a percentage of her targets' HP as well as he own AD.

The monster thing is a bug
Really broken actually, I always solo Dragon with her at level 5
It doesn't help that kindred is recommended to build on hit effects. So all of the lifesteal/on hit magic damage/%HP damage.
